Html:
Hi guys. I have download this project and see nice and exellent demo application.

The first step, as i think, is to open simple sample (for windows forms) and try to create my own application, but...i dont see any samples on download page :( there are only demo winforms project in source code part, but this demo app is VERY big.

Pleae, tell me, is there any samples that can teach with using GMap very fast?

For example, how can i add such things like zoom instrument on the gmapcontrol for winforms?

Or what is GMapOverlay struct and how it use?

It's very easy to use. Just drop the control on the form and with a few lines of code to set a location or zoom and it just works. I was able to get GMapOverlay working with little help and mainly relying on the autocomplete in Visual Studio Express
That is not what GMap.NET provides. You have to do that yourself.

Thanks.

Another question - can i get time zone by coordinates with GMap?

No. Again, not what it's designed to do.

On Jul 26, 2012 4:33 PM, "Sellec" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: Sellec

Thanks.

Another question - can i get time zone by coordinates with GMap?
